channel.title: R Tutorial on Hugo Apéro
channel.description: Recent content in R Tutorial on Hugo Apéro

item.title: Hello-World
item.description: The first thing I remember about programming is “Hello World” text. When I started to learn coding, the very first assignment was to print the “Hello World” text. So, here I begin my very first post by printing this very text using base R commands. The text can be directly printed using the print command. print("Hello World") Or, the character string can be assigned to an object which can be used for printing.
